comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: This Fokker D.VII is shown after the end of the war during the occupation period. This aircraft has been "defanged" and the top of the cockpit area where the guns were mounted covered over and a large windscreen added. It wears the insignia of the 9th Aero Squadron which was a US bomber squadron that flew Breguet 14B2 aircraft during the war. There is another photo of this aircraft from the front right quarter with someone in the cockpit ready to take off.
